name: Pumpkin Tower
description:
This project was realized during the 49th Ludum Dare, whose subject was : Unstable.
We had the idea to pile up the most things and that everything can collapse like in "Tricky Tower" with bonus and penalty.
Autumn being here, we wanted it to be topical with Halloween fast approaching! But all this in a "Chill" atmosphere :).

This project were realized by 4 person :
Naomi Gaye : Game Artist
Louis Remy : Game Artist
Léa Lenain : Game Artist
William Pecqueux : Programmer

Game designed by the whole team.

Hope you enjoy !

Command : 

Pivot : A / Z / E / Q / S / D.
Move : Directional Arrow.
Speed Fallen : Space Bar.
Restart : R.
Return to Menu : Echap.
